metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29806 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - high.
metadata.Description:
ZoneMinder before 1.36.13 allows remote code execution via an invalid language. Ability to create a debug log file at an arbitrary pathname contributes to exploitability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.36.12+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.36.12+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
